description: Describes the universally unique identifier (UUID) associated with a local user in a data source.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application connected to the user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user email address attached to the user.

nested_items.name: userAliases
nested_items.description: A list of user aliases attached to a user.

nested_items.name: indexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.
